name: pnp-list-formatting-word-cloud
title: Word Cloud Column Formatting
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use SharePoint Column Formatting to generate a dynamic word cloud for list items.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a dynamic word cloud using SharePoint Column Formatting JSON. It displays words from multiple label columns with varying font sizes, colors, and bold styling based on word length and specific highlights.

metadata.value: Dynamic font size, color coding, bold highlighting

references.name: Use column formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use column formatting to customize how fields in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. This sample shows a word cloud implementation using JSON formatting for multiple label columns with dynamic styles.
